Reviews.Title: easy breezy
Reviews.Author: mandi
Reviews.Content: I purchased on another site for 20 bucks less...but either way still a good price for the size and easy use. Go for it.

Reviews.Title: Muy buena Camara
Reviews.Author: Roke_Blanco
Reviews.Content: Escelente camra muy compacta, ideal para viajeros o paseos cortos en las q no quieres lelvar tanto bulto en el bolsillo o cartera, excelente

ProductInfo.Features:
Insanely small credit card sized styling makes it irresistible to take along wherever you go
The cool little mirror on the front makes framing self-portraits and group shots so much fun
3X wide-angle optical zoom allows everyone to get in the shot
One-button upload to e-mail, KODAK PULSE Display and other popular social networking sites
Take amazing HD quality pictures in 16:9 format then view your pictures in high definition on an HDTV or other HD devices
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak EasyShare Mini M200 10 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.5-Inch LCD - White
